name: Superload Chicken: The Treasure Hunters
description:
Description

In the corner of the world, there is a place named the Eggy Town. The residents who live there are called the Superload Chickens. On a sunny and peaceful day, one of the chickens, Bucky discovered a piece of old treasure map, and it showed the location of the biggest treasure chest in the world. Bucky then assembled his brothers and friends to look for this treasure chest together. And so, their exciting adventure begins.

Controls

  • Movement: (Player1): W A S D
  • Shooting: (Player1): F
  • Pause: F1
  • Restart: F2

                               (Player 2): Direction Keys

     (Player2): P
